p: The viruses recovered during viral RTIs were RV/EV (27/44; 61%), RSV (6/44; 14%), adenovirus (6/44; 14%), influenza (4/44; 9%), bocavirus (3/44; 7%), parainfluenzae (2/44; 5%) and metapneumovirus (1/44; 2%). Eight viral co-infections were identified during RTIs; one of them required hospitalization (TableÂ 2).
